title: "Healthcare Artificial Intelligence Market By Trends, Statistics & Regional Forecast 2021-2026"
excerpt: "Delaware, U.S. - Rising need to decrease fraud, enhance security in healthcare, and quality of care delivery is expected to augment the healthcare artificial intelligence market size by 2026. The use of telemedicine incorporated with artificial intelligence has propelled in order to give remote services to patients living in less-developed areas having better patient care."
